data.title: Bibliography
data.meta_description: The Scripture quotations on this site are, unless noted otherwise, from the New Revised Standard Version Bible, ©1989, Division of Christian Education of the National Council of the Churches of Christ in the U.S.A., and are used by permission. All rights reserved. References to the Greek text of the New Testament are, unless otherwise noted,…
data.text:
The Scripture quotations on this site are, unless noted otherwise, from the New Revised Standard Version Bible, ©1989, Division of Christian Education of the National Council of the Churches of Christ in the U.S.A., and are used by permission. All rights reserved.

References to the Greek text of the New Testament are, unless otherwise noted, based on the Nestle-Aland 28th edition (Aland, et al.).

● ● ●

Aland, Barbara, Kurt Aland, Johannes Karavidopoulos, Carlo M. Martini, and Bruce M. Metzger, eds. Nestle-Aland – Novum Testamentum Graece. 28th revised ed. Stuttgart: Deutsche Bibelgesellschaft, 2012.

Borg, Marcus J. Speaking Christian: Why Christian Words Have Lost Their Power–And How they Can Be Restored. New York: HarperOne, 2011.

Brown, Raymond E. The Death of the Messiah: From Gethsemane to the Grave: A Commentary on the Passion Narratives in the Four Gospels. 2 Vols. 1994. New Haven: Yale University Press, 2008.

Crossan, John Dominic. The Historical Jesus: The Life of a Mediterranean Jewish Peasant. San Francisco: HarperSanFrancisco, 1991.

Downey, Michael, ed. The New Dictionary of Catholic Spirituality. Collegeville, MN: Liturgical Press, 1993.

Dunn, James D.G. Did the First Christians Worship Jesus? The New Testament Evidence. Louisville, KY: Westminster John Knox Press, 2010.

Fitzmyer, Joseph A. The Gospel of Luke. Anchor Yale Bible. 2 Vols. 1974. New Haven: Yale University Press, 2008.

Fowler, James W. Faithful Change: The Personal and Public Challenges of Postmodern Life. Nashville, TN: Abingdon Press, 1996.

Fowler, James W. Stages of Faith: The Psychology of Human Development and the Quest for Meaning. 1981. New York: HarperOne, 1995.

Haught, John F. Christianity and Science: Toward a Theology of Nature. Maryknoll, NY: Orbis, 2007.

James, William. The Varieties of Religious Experience. New York: Penguin, 1985.

Lonergan, Bernard. Method in Theology. 1971. Toronto: University of Toronto Press, 2003.

McLaren, Brian D. A New Kind of Christianity: Ten Questions That Are Transforming the Faith. New York: HarperCollins, 2010.

Nolland, John. Luke. Word Biblical Commentary. 3 Vols. Dallas: Word, 1998-2002.

Steindl-Rast, Brother David. Deeper Than Words: Living the Apostles’ Creed. New York: Image, 2010.

Wilber, Ken. Integral Spirituality. Boston, MA: Integral Books, 2007.

Wink, Walter. The Bible in Human Transformation: Toward a New Paradigm for Biblical Study. 1973. Minneapolis, MN: Fortress Press, 2010.

Wink, Walter. Engaging the Powers: Discernment and Resistance in a World of Domination. Minneapolis: Fortress Press, 1992.
